remarks: An infinite series of complex terms is a function from ` NN ` to ` CC ` .  (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
serf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
serf.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
serf.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
serf $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) : Z --> CC ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
